New Records: Brayan Bello logged a career-high eight innings
Key Match Events: Tyler O'Neill belted a two-run homer into the Monster Seats
Post-Match Reflections: Alex Cora praised Bello's performance, calling him 'outstanding'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Red Sox stopped their five-game slide with the win
They have won the last two games going into Thursday night's finale
The team closed the gap to three games behind the Twins for the third American League Wild Card spot
Others: The game lasted a mere two hours and five minutes
Chris Bassitt created a compelling pitchers' duel for the Blue Jays
